description: This file defines the GameService class which provides methods for playing a round of Rock-Paper-Scissors and serializing the outcome. It also defines the PlayOutcome data class representing the result of a game round.

classes.name: PlayOutcome
classes.description: Value object representing the outcome of a single play.

classes.name: GameService
classes.description: Application service for Rock-Paper-Scissors logic, providing methods to play a round and serialize outcomes.

methods.name: PlayOutcome play(self, player_choice: Choice)
methods.description: Play a single round, generating the computer's move, and determine the outcome.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] to_dict(self, outcome: PlayOutcome)
methods.description: Serialize a PlayOutcome instance to a dictionary suitable for API responses.

ctags.name: to_dict
ctags.pattern: /^    def to_dict(self, outcome: PlayOutcome) -> Dict[str, str]:$/
